items.name: Party Keg
items.desc:
To order holla at yo@forestroad.co.uk
London Only
Comes with a 30 liter (roughly 50 pints!) keg of a beer of your choice and a keg pump.
Once opened, the keg can last up to 3 days.
Once the beer is all gone, we will come and collect the empty keg and pump!
Beers available:
POSH Lager 30L - 4.1% - £150
WORK IPA 30L - 5.4% - £150
EASY Pale Ale - 3.8% - £150
Keg pump deposit - £100 (which we’ll refund you after we collect the empty keg and pump).

items.name: Posh Lager
items.desc:
Our crispyboi classic - All British Lager
The second core beer of the Forest Road family was developed specifically to be an accessible, filtered, all grain lager to provide drinkers with a different choice to the glucose-laden mass-produced corporate beers that still dominate the market till this day.
Bright, filtered with noble hop aromas with a light malt body that transport you to the barley fields. Fermented with Danish lager-yeast.
Posh Lager is brewed with technical precision to make for London's only low-calorie premium lager that's not owned by a huge drinks company tricking you into thinking it's craft beer.
MALT: Pilsner, Wheat
HOPS: Perle & Challenger
YEAST: Lager Yeast
ABV - 4.1%
COLOR - 9º EBC
RpH - 4.3
Original Extract - 9.7º P
Residual (Apparent) Extract - 1.7º P
Proof of age and signature required on receipt.
Package details
12 x 330ml Cans. Drink fresh.
Dimensions:
Weight:
24 x 330ml Cans. Drink fresh.

items.name: Stay Home Lager
items.desc:
£1 DONATED TO NHS FOR EVERY BOTTLE SOLD
Stay HOME Lager is a collaboration brew that blends our very own POSH Lager (4.1%) with Cameron's house lager, with a classic, easy going flavour.
MALT: Pilsner, Wheat
HOPS: Perle, Challenger & Saaz
YEAST: Lager Yeast
ABV - 3.9%
COLOR - 9º EBC
RpH - 4.3
Original Extract - 9.7º P
Residual (Apparent) Extract - 1.7º P
Proof of age and signature required on receipt.

items.name: Work IPA
items.desc:
Our first love and our flagship pale. Complex malt body with razor-sharp citrus and pine aromas. Made with our house strain of yeast that attenuates bright with a little time and adds a nudge of peach around the edges.
MALT: Pale, Special 'B'
HOPS: Columbus, Cascade, Centennial, Chinook
YEAST: East Coast Ale
ABV - 5.4%
COLOR - 20º EBC
RpH - 4.3
Original Extract - 12.2º P
Residual (Apparent) Extract - 2º P
Proof of age and signature required on receipt.
Package details
12 x 330ml Can. Drink fresh.
